name: Woocommerce Watchlist Notifications
author: Priya Jain

sections.description:
Woocommerce watchlist notification is an addon of woocommerce . Allow to add products to the watchlist. Once product will be added to the watchlist user will be able to get notification emails whenever any new similar product will be added to the system.

This plugin focused on ease of integration, ease of use, and extensibility. It is deliberately powerful yet unbelievably simple.

Users can customize button, styling, email description from the setting page.

Users can manage all the keywords on my-account page. They can search, add, delete keyword according to the need.

Suggestions

You are excited from the “WooCommerce Watchlist Notifications” plugin and want to contribute? Get involved at our GitHub repository
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire woocommerce-watchlist-notification folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress admin.
  3. Go to the watchlist notifications settings page and do the settings according to the need.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire woocommerce-watchlist-notification folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress admin.
  3. Go to the watchlist notifications settings page and do the settings according to the need.

How to customize email notification template?

You can overwrite email template on the theme’s folder and then can do necessary updates on email template.
sections.changelog:
0.1 Version 16/12/2017

  • New: Add to my watchlist
  • New: Display watchlist
  • New: email notifications

We Need Your Support

It is really hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you are enjoying using our woocommerce watchlist notification plugin and find it useful, then please consider Making a Donation. Your donation will help us to encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.
